name: PlayStation All-Stars: Battle Royale - Isaac Clarke and Zeus DLC
name_original: PlayStation All-Stars: Battle Royale - Isaac Clarke and Zeus DLC
description:
PlayStation All-Stars: Battle Royale - Isaac Clarke and Zeus DLC is an arcade-fighting game developed by SCE Santa Monica and SuperBot Entertainment. It came out on 19-03-2013. Sony Computer Entertainment published the game.
PlayStation All-Stars: Battle Royale - Isaac Clarke and Zeus DLC is available on PlayStation 3.
